table.style: border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; height: 265px; background-color: #ffffff; border-color: #ffffff; border-style: none;

td.span:
Even if you get Emergency Calls now, you need to create an account to get all new content!
The Town of New Canaan has expanded its use of the Everbridge system to include more than just emergency notifications! By creating an account with New Canaan’s Everbridge you can choose the information you want to receive, then provide your choices of how we can contact you - via phone, text and/or email. We will only use voice phone calls for emergencies.
When you create an account, you will be asked to create a username & password, provide your address (as some notifications can be sent to specific geographic areas such as road closures/work) and your choices for how we can contact you.
Once you've made an account you can update and change your selections whenever you want, or delete your account and unsubscribe at any time.

img.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

span.strong: To create an account click here
To modify an existing account click here
When you create your account, you can choose to receive communications from the below options:

li.span: Notifications from Emergency Management about incidents that include life safety, disasters, severe weather and large scale power outages

News From Town Hall is an online-only newsletter where each issue will carry a personal letter from the First Selectman along with news of initiatives and special projects by various Town departments, governing boards, commissions, etc.
Leaf Pickup Start and End Dates

Police notifications about emergency road closures, community awareness updates (police activity, crime sprees such as vehicle break-ins and mail thefts) and public service announcements (planned events, traffic issues such as parades or town events impacting traffic)
Information regarding upcoming educational programs being offered in New Canaan by the Health department such as:

Tick talks, mosquito borne virus updates, QPR mental health trainings, infectious disease topics/updates, food safety/recalls/outbreaks, toys containing lead recalls, seasonal flu clinics, childhood immunization program updates, food allergy awareness, public health emergency preparedness, blood sugar/diabetes screening upcoming clinics
Flyers for upcoming trainings with dates/times/location
Pamphlets/brochures fact sheets on various health related topics

span.strong: To create an account click here or the Everbridge icon below
